price: Isaaniif yakka [dhiigaatu] narra jira; kanaafuu na ajjeesuun sodaadha.”
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
